title: WHAT U WANT BE ?
author: Vaibhav Khushalani
readmore: Avinash Chauhan along with his partner Akshit Singh Soni own BooksOnGo an online bookstore. The two best friends came up with a platform to provide books at economical prices and create a community for book lovers.
blog:
Tell us something about your business ?- Akshit: “We own an online start-up named Booksongo, here we provide all kind of reading material on Instagram and it’s a 100% Indian brand. We have a huge and varied collection of reading material from which our customers can choose from.”

strong>How did you get the concept or idea for your business ?

-From the very beginning we both are avid readers and being best friends, together we sell something that we love.

title: Trust is everything
author: Saurabh pansari
readmore: Sensitive people have a loyal heart inside their body They only want a company of valuable people  to whom they can trustOn this planet everything based on trust Everyone have a trust on sun that sun rises and we walk up
blog:
Sensitive people have a loyal heart inside their body

They only want a company of valuable people to whom they can trust

On this planet everything based on trust

Everyone have a trust on sun that sun rises and we walk up

Just think one day sun break our trust what happens

Everyone have a trust on their friend but if suddenly that friend break trust what happens

Everyone have a trust on rain that its may comes and fullfill our needs but suddenly rain doesn't come for a year

Everyone have a trust on their parents , on the basis of that trust a mom keep a baby inside her body for 9 month and the baby born on the behalf of that trust my mom care about me



Parents trust on their daughter that she feel us proud but what happens when the parents get to know that their daughter cheating on them







Trust is everything and everyone should have trust on each other
